  Create a new Claude coding session with an optional name.                                                             
  If no name is provided, a timestamp-based name will be generated.                                                     
                                                                                                                        
  You can also attach to existing sessions as new panes or windows/tabs.                                                
                                                                                                                        
  Examples:                                                                                                             
    claude-pilot create                              # Create session with auto-generated name                          
    claude-pilot create my-project                   # Create session named "my-project"                                
    claude-pilot create --desc "React app"           # Create session with description                                  
    claude-pilot create --project ./src              # Create session with project path                                 
    claude-pilot create --attach-to main --as-pane   # Create as new pane in 'main' session                             
    claude-pilot create --attach-to main --as-window # Create as new window in 'main' session                           
    claude-pilot create debug --attach-to main --as-pane --split h  # Create horizontal pane split                      
    claude-pilot create --id my-session-123          # Create session with specific ID                                  
                                                                                                                        
         
  USAGE  
         
    claude-pilot create [session-name] [--flags]  
         
  FLAGS  
         
    --as-pane         Create as new pane in existing session
    --as-window       Create as new window/tab in existing session
    -a --attach-to    Attach to existing session (session name)
    --config          Config file (default is $HOME/.config/claude-pilot/claude-pilot.yaml)
    --debug           Enable debug logging (overrides --verbose)
    -d --description  Description for the session
    -h --help         Help for create
    --id              Session ID/name (alternative to positional argument)
    --no-color        Disable ANSI colors in output
    -o --output       Output format (human|table|json|ndjson|quiet) (human)
    -p --project      Project path for the session (defaults to current directory)
    --split           Split direction for panes: 'h' (horizontal) or 'v' (vertical) (v)
    --trace           Enable trace logging (overrides --debug and --verbose)
    -v --verbose      Verbose output
    --yes             Accept defaults for prompts (non-interactive mode)
